name: Grace of Letoile
description:
Throw yourself into fierce battles to steal Sertzes, the cores of automata able to make wishes come true!

Vedley, who lost his parents in a sad incident, hears from Achieitz about the existence of the Letoiles, who are able to make any wish come true.
In order to turn back time and try to save his parents, Vedley makes a pact with a Letoile and becomes her Maschelle, and they throw themselves into the battles to steal Sertzes from the other Letoiles.

Harness the power of Skill Plates and Gems, combining them to unleash special skills and magic. The Field Effects add a layer of complexity to battles, offering both advantageous and disadvantageous effects, making your tactical choices crucial. The Chronos Gauge plays a central role, allowing you to perform unique skills and launch Interrupt Actions, enabling you to seize control of the battlefield. Your journey is about mastering time and power, and every decision counts. Will you rewrite the fate that awaits Vedley?

Features:

  • Skill Plates and Gems: Mix and match powerful Gems in Skill Plates to use various magic and skills, enhancing your character's abilities.
  • Field Effects: Navigate a dynamic battlefield where advantageous and disadvantageous effects challenge your tactical prowess. Use Interrupt Actions to shift the tide in your favor.
  • Chronos Gauge Mastery: The key to victory, manage the Chronos Gauge to trigger just time bonuses and recover its level. Shared among party members, it's essential for Particular Skills and Interrupt Actions.
